title: Nobunaga-sensei no Osanazuma (Nobunaga teacher's young bride)
synopsis: One day, a girl who loves me will suddenly appear before meâ€”Middle school teacher Nobunaga has always been dreaming of such a gal game-like situation. However, the one who appeared before him was Kichou, a 14-year-old girl who proclaims herself as his wife. Appears to have arrived from the Sengoku era, she mistakes Nobunaga as Nobunaga Oda and urges him to conceive a child with her. Thus begins the age-difference love comedy between a gal game-loving teacher and a Sengoku era expert princess.
characters: ['Saitou, Kichou', 'Ikoma, Kitsuno', 'Oda, Nobunaga', 'Hoshigaoka, Yuri', 'Biwajima, Mayu', 'Atsuta, Ranma']
staff: [['Sasaki, Tokihiro', ['Director']], ['Abe, Nobuyuki', ['Sound Director']], ['Kuramori, Rokurou', ['Episode Director']], ['Tachibana, Rika', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
